summary: This is an internal email chain from July 5, 2022, regarding the compilation of a weekly OPA (Office of Public Affairs) bulletin. It lists several Department of Justice press releases, including the sentencing of Ghislaine Maxwell to 20 years in prison for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors. The document shows the routine administrative process of distributing news about various cases.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Sentenced to 20 years in prison for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors, as listed in a DOJ press release for the weekly bulletin.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the co-conspirator with Ghislaine Maxwell in the sexual abuse of minors, as referenced in the bulletin item about Maxwell's sentencing.

persons.name: Lev Parnas
persons.context: Sentenced to 20 months in prison for campaign finance, wire fraud, and false statements offenses, as listed in a separate DOJ press release for the bulletin.

connections.description: Conspired together to sexually abuse minors, as stated in the press release summary of Maxwell's sentencing.

events.title: OPA Bulletin Compilation
events.description: Internal email correspondence compiling a list of Department of Justice press releases for a weekly OPA bulletin.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Sentencing
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was sentenced to 20 years in prison for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors.

events.title: Lev Parnas Sentencing
events.description: Lev Parnas was sentenced to 20 months in prison for campaign finance, wire fraud, and false statements offenses.

keyFacts: The document is an administrative email from July 5, 2022, about compiling a weekly DOJ press bulletin.
It lists a press release announcing Ghislaine Maxwell's 20-year prison sentence for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors.
The email shows the routine, internal process for distributing news of significant case outcomes like Maxwell's sentencing.
